metadata.dc:author: Lara Ponte, R
Ruíz de Chávez, M
metadata.dc:description: The decentralization of health services has been planned as a process that must reach the municipal level. The present work analyses the global framework of the decentralization strategy, the components for structural health changes, the characteristics of the transferences to the states, and ends with the basic elements of strengthening and decentralization of health services to the municipalities.
metadata.dc:title: Estrategias para la descentralización municipal en salud.
[Strategies for municipal decentralization in health].
